content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (-5.0, -20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -20.0) with coal as fuel and currently working with iron-ore as input.

### Stone Furnace at position (-5.0, -25.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -25.0) with coal as fuel but currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Stone Furnace at position (-5.0, -30.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -30.0) with coal as fuel but currently has no ingredients to smelt.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access non-existing entities
- Ensure that the position you are trying to access has the entity present. Check the coordinates before attempting to get an entity.

### Errors when setting recipes on furnaces
- Make sure that the furnace is operational and has the required ingredients and fuel before attempting to set a recipe.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Confirm that you have the items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace.

### Errors when dealing with smelting timeouts
- Regularly check that your furnaces have both fuel and the necessary ingredients to avoid smelting timeouts.
